name: webauto-project
description: WebAuto Project Collection - Multiple Web Automation Modules

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd sharedmodule && npm install && cd mcp-framework && npm install && cd ../weibo-workflow-system && npm install && cd ../openai-compatible-providers && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd sharedmodule/mcp-framework && npm run build && cd ../weibo-workflow-system && npm run build && cd ../openai-compatible-providers && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd sharedmodule/mcp-framework && npm test && cd ../weibo-workflow-system && npm test && cd ../openai-compatible-providers && npm test
scripts.lint:all: cd sharedmodule/mcp-framework && npm run lint && cd ../weibo-workflow-system && npm run lint && cd ../openai-compatible-providers && npm run lint

author: WebAuto Team
